    connect()
    Executes the prepared statement that will fetch an image based on the entryId denoted by the URL of this connection.

    Consults the current FileNameMap to obtain the MIME type for the file name extension for the entry handled by this connection.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect() throws IOException
      Executes the prepared statement that will fetch an image based on the entryId denoted by the URL of this connection. If connect has been called already, subsequent calls are ignored.
      Specified by:
      connect in class URLConnection
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getInputStream

      public InputStream getInputStream() throws IOException
      Creates a new ByteArrayInputStream for the image that was obtained during connect().
      Overrides:
      getInputStream in class URLConnection
      Returns:
      the created input stream.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getContentType

      public String getContentType()
      Consults the current FileNameMap to obtain the MIME type for the file name extension for the entry handled by this connection.
      Overrides:
      getContentType in class URLConnection
      Returns:
      the content type based on the file name extension.
